timeline.message: Add Branch Flag for Nightly CodeBuild #57
Update ENV Variable for Nightly Build Name
Nigtly Build - Fix FileName for Build Artifacts
Update README for accessing test logs

timeline.bodyText: Use of public docker image possesses risk that if your current branch has introduced new dependencies then those won't available in that image.
timeline.author: dhaniram-kshirsagar

-### Running the test manually.
-
-Clone Torch Serve Repo & Build the Docker Image for the execition env.
+[Test Logs By Date](https://torchserve-regression-test.s3.amazonaws.com/public/TS-NIGHTLY-REGRESSION-2020-05-20/tmp/test_exec.log) - Update Date in URL
 
-```
-git clone https://github.com/pytorch/serve
-cd serve
-./build_image.sh
-```
+### Running the test manually.
 
-This would build a docker Image with a pytorch/torchserve:latest in which we would run our Regression Tests.
+Use Public TorchServe Docker Image for the execition env.

replies.bodyText: Changed this to use build the docker image locally.
replies.author: dhanainme
